DIVI Quality Indicator 8: Structured Communication with Patients and Relatives

blockquote.p: title: DIVI Quality Indicator 8a: Inital Structured Communication with Patients and/or Relatives

div.p: For all Intensive Care Patients, an initial structured communication with the Patients and/or their Relatives should take place within 72 hours of Admission to Intensive Care.

blockquote.p: definition: Inital Structured Communication with Patients and/or Relatives
title: DIVI Quality Indicator 8b: Periodic Structured Communication with Patients and/or Relatives

div.p: For all Intensive Care Patients, at least one structured communication with the Patients and/or their Relatives should take place every week.
